title: How to Make Pork and Beans Alternative Hamburger Treat

steps.headline: Cut 2 strips of bacon in a small saucepan.
Add 1 chopped onion to the pan.
Sauté the mixture in the saucepan.
Mix in this browned ground beef.
Add the pork and beans (vegetarian style may be substituted), ketchup or tomato paste, dry mustard, salt and Worcestershire sauce.
Pour the mixture in a casserole dish.
Bake at 375 °F (191 °C) for about a half hour.

text: Cut 2 strips of bacon in a small saucepan.  Add 1 chopped onion to the pan.  Sauté the mixture in the saucepan.  Brown the ground beef.  Mix in this browned ground beef.  Add the pork and beans (vegetarian style may be substituted), ketchup or tomato paste, dry mustard, salt and Worcestershire sauce.  Combine all the items.  Pour the mixture in a casserole dish.  Bake at 375 °F (191 °C) for about a half hour.  Finished.
